title: Tour Daily Podcast, Rest Day: Van der Poel did how many watts on the Mûr-de-Bretagne?
content:
Tour Daily Podcast, Rest Day: Van der Poel did how many watts on the Mûr-de-Bretagne?

Matt de Neef caught up with Ben O’Connor after his Tour de France stage win. Dane Cash chatted with Kristof de Kegel, the coach of Mathieu van der Poel.

Ruth Winder checks in from stage 4 of the Giro Donne.

author: Abby Mickey
